languages.text: "Б-благодарю за вмешательство, Ваша Светлость!" {n}Дворянин прижимает руку к сердцу и низко вам кланяется. Как только вы отходите в сторону, к месту происшествия подбегают стражники.{/n}
"Th-thank you for intervening, Your Celestial Highness!" {n}The nobleman lays his hand on his heart and bows low to you. As soon as you step aside, the guards barrel toward the scene.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Б-благодарю за вмешательство, Ваша Светлость!" {n}Дворянин прижимает руку к сердцу и низко вам кланяется. Как только вы отходите в сторону, к месту происшествия подбегают стражники.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Th-thank you for intervening, Your Celestial Highness!" {n}The nobleman lays his hand on his heart and bows low to you. As soon as you step aside, the guards barrel toward the scene.{/n}

"Th-thank you for intervening, Your Celestial Highness!" {n}The nobleman lays his hand on his heart and bows low to you. As soon as you step aside, the guards barrel toward the scene.{/n}
"Oh, thank you, Your Celestial Highness!" {n}The nobleman lays his hand on his heart and bows low to you. As soon as you step aside, the guards barrel toward the vigilante.{/n}

languages.text: “感……感谢您出手相救，来自上界的大人！”{n}贵族将手放在心口，向你深深鞠了一躬。你一走开，周围的卫兵就朝袭击者扑了过去。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Th-thank you for intervening, Your Celestial Highness!" {n}The nobleman lays his hand on his heart and bows low to you. As soon as you step aside, the guards barrel toward the scene.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “感……感谢您出手相救，来自上界的大人！”{n}贵族将手放在心口，向你深深鞠了一躬。你一走开，周围的卫兵就朝袭击者扑了过去。{/n}

languages.text: 「おお、ありがとうございます、天の閣下！」{n}貴族は胸に手を当て、深く一礼した。身を引いた途端、衛兵たちが犯罪現場に向かって駆けつけた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Th-thank you for intervening, Your Celestial Highness!" {n}The nobleman lays his hand on his heart and bows low to you. As soon as you step aside, the guards barrel toward the scene.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「おお、ありがとうございます、天の閣下！」{n}貴族は胸に手を当て、深く一礼した。身を引いた途端、衛兵たちが自警団員をめがけて突進した。{/n}

languages.text: «Gra... ¡Gracias por intervenir, Excelencia Celestial!» {n}El noble se lleva la mano al corazón y se inclina ante ti. Tan pronto te apartas, los guardias echan a correr hacia la escena.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Th-thank you for intervening, Your Celestial Highness!" {n}The nobleman lays his hand on his heart and bows low to you. As soon as you step aside, the guards barrel toward the scene.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Gra... ¡Gracias por intervenir, Excelencia Celestial!» {n}El noble se lleva la mano al corazón y se inclina ante ti. Tan pronto te apartas, los guardias echan a correr hacia la escena.{/n}

languages.text: "Müdahale ettiğiniz için sağ olun Semavi Efendimiz!" {n}Soylu adam, elini kalbine götürüp seni eğilerek selamlıyor. Sen geri çekilince muhafızlar, silahlarını sahneye doğrultuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Th-thank you for intervening, Your Celestial Highness!" {n}The nobleman lays his hand on his heart and bows low to you. As soon as you step aside, the guards barrel toward the scene.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Müdahale ettiğiniz için sağ olun Semavi Efendimiz!" {n}Soylu adam, elini kalbine götürüp seni eğilerek selamlıyor. Sen geri çekilince muhafızlar, silahlarını sahneye doğrultuyor.{/n}

languages.text: « Merci pour votre intervention, votre Altesse Célestissime ! » {n}Le noble pose la main sur son cœur et s'incline profondément. À peine vous êtes-vous {mf|éloigné|éloignée} que des gardes se jettent sur la scène.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Th-thank you for intervening, Your Celestial Highness!" {n}The nobleman lays his hand on his heart and bows low to you. As soon as you step aside, the guards barrel toward the scene.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Merci pour votre intervention, votre Altesse Célestissime ! » {n}Le noble pose la main sur son cœur et s'incline profondément. À peine vous êtes-vous {mf|éloigné|éloignée} que des gardes se jettent sur la scène.{/n}

languages.text: "D-danke für Euer Eingreifen, Eure himmlische Hoheit!" {n}Der Adelige legt die Hand auf sein Herz und verneigt sich tief vor dir. Sobald du zur Seite trittst, erscheinen die Wachen auf der Szene.{/n}
